remarks: The last symbol of a word cyclically shifted by N positions is the symbol at index (N-1) of the original word.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Mar-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 1-Nov-2018.)
statement: lswcshw $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ( 1 ... ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( lastS ` ( W cyclShift N ) ) = ( W ` ( N - 1 ) ) ) $.
